entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016
